basics.label: Director of Business Development
basics.summary: Customer service based marketer and administrative professional with hands on experience in sales, marketing, and operations. Known for being knowledgeable and supportive while providing clear and sincere communication. Dependable Business Development expert with 4 + years as a top sales performer in medical market.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Strategic marketing. Exceed budget goals by 150%. Network of supporting physicians and case managers. Recruit in-house physicians from referring hospitals. Optimize financial reimbursement. Led a team of six sales & marketing representatives. Internal Operations. Contract negotiations.
highlights: Surpassed all sales goals by 25% for east valley region
Increased working network in territory to enhance sales performance
Increased cost-effectiveness by 20 % through compliance enforcement and implementation of a new quality control system

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Create and sustain strong relationships with referral sources. Market to physicians, case managers, and patient families to inform them about their choice for long-term acute care. Work with the sales team to co-market new territories and hospitals.
highlights: Promoted to Director of Business Development

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed territory to gain/sustain strong relationships and build referral source. Lead presentations to physicians and case managers. Increased territories' admissions by more than 200%. Assisted with hitting record census in the history of Restora Hospital.
highlights: Transferred to the west valley territory to assist with rebuilding relationships and raise census
Mended broken relationships in the territory and created new ones. Raised census by 150% within a month's time

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinate daily duties. Administrative assistance. Monitor cardiac rhythms. Chart compliance Medical order completion..
